caption.p:
Projected advances of the GDD 5≥1200 boundary. The green area describes the current extent of the boreal region
66, 67 . GDD 5 values were estimated by averaging the projections of seven CO 2 emission based GCMs (Extended Data Table 1). Each time step describes a five-year average of all estimates by the seven GCMs. The variability in projection among models is presented in Fig. 4 and Table 1. Map created using ArcGIS Desktop v. 10.4.1
65 .
